Blog.post: Hey there.. Well I learned the results of the xrays this morning, I have mild spinal deterioration *terminal*, she also said I have a disc in my neck on the verge of disintegrating.. She gave me Naproxin and some anti depressent that is supposed to help "balance" things.. as she put it. I go back again in a month. She is also referring me to a physical therapist *yippee** I remember this from last time! Anywho gotta get moving... more soon Mage26

Hey Curt! I got surprised yesterday.. mom brought me home some fencing and more berries.. she said consider it an early birthday present.. *not really early as today is my birthday** .. Went out today to check not a single one missing! :D .. Thinking still about the egg and water idea just to make sure! Hugs Mage26

Ok .. now I woke up in a good mood till I walked out side that is!! I got some garden raiders.. DEER! They beheaded all my strawberries and one of my mother's rose bushes.. any ideas? I've heard soap bars, human urine, sulfur, and human hair.. am at wits end they were all doing so GOOD! :( Becky

hehehe .. Got one up on ya .. mint is slowly coming back, when I first moved in it was being choked out by crab grass and weeds.. Only other one doing good that I started from seed is the cilantro.. my lavender, rosemary and catnip didn't do too good thanks to hubby's brat kitty! who's sitting in my lap right now being a very big pain! Yesterday was my daughter's sixth grade graduation .. its too SOON! **shaking head* what's worse she raided MY closet for that perfect dress and MY shoes! lmao .. Anywho gonna go for now since this lil brat kitty just seems to think he needs attention CONSTANTLY .. Hugs Becky

Hey there, what's going on? I was going to start my herb garden today but the dang weather didn't want to cooporate with me. I picked up a few different varieties of Balms & mints today though. Now if I can remeber to weed it more often. http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Weed_Rather_Be_Gardening/

Sound like us, I have bush peas, trellis peas, sweet 100 tomatoes (only ones I've had luck with!), and about three different varieties of bell peppers including habenero!,strawberries, brussel sprouts, broccoli, lettuce, walla walla sweet onion, and green beans. To date, the trellis peas are bout as tall as me 5', and my berries have three runners! So we're getting there slowly and with the HELP of my cats the population of mice and moles are slowly depleting so to an extent animals are an aide to gardens. Is your dog digging? There are a few ogranic variety replellents out there on the market today that MIGHT proove useful. Keep me informed! By the way am a grandma AGAIN as of 11:15 last night my adopted brat gave birth to baby girl:D I KNEW she would have her before my birthday and walla the tuesday BEFORE my birthday none the less.. mine is the 22nd! Anywho .. gotta get moving for now more soon Becky

Hey Rebecka - What's going on hon? We finally got garden in today, I still need to throw in a few different varieties of fresh herbs, you know...Lemon Balm, Basil, etc..... We're having the damnest time keeping our one dog to stay out of the garden, I even set up a fence...that little bastard. We didn't go way over board this year...just have a few tomatoes, peppers, beans/peas, cucumbers as well as the herbs...I hate weeding and being that I work from home, well guess who gets stuck doing it...yours truly :o)

Thank you! Got it bookmarked now :D ... Switched to MSN Messenger got tired of the trouble with yahoo pager.. you can get ahold of me at RJS_Mage@hotmail.com too now. You should see my garden!! .. Will have pics soon, got peppers, tomatoes, berries and peas OH and of course the walla walla sweet onion! :D Talk to ya later Mage26

Thanks for the addy .. I got rid of yahoo messenger and went to msn messenger, got tired of the bugs! You can reach me at RJS_Mage@hotmail.com now with messenger:D You should see my garden! Will have pics soon! Talk to ya later Mage26

Hey you .. got some good news at the doctor's the other day.. I've gained four pounds.. and the echocardiogram came out a'ok .. she's still going to have a cardiologist look at it to be sure because I'm her first patient she's had with Marfan's .. that's all the news for now .. Becky
You alive out there? Just wanted to let you know I FINALLY set up a profile on here .. headed on to last email site and then am done :D Talk to ya later Becky

Yeah I know am late:D .. Sorry still adjusting to these meds they have me on .. all three are better at NIGHT! lmao .. otherwise am zonked out cold all day. This last weekend was first major harvest of my peas .. man were my fingers green from shucking! .. HUGE bowl of peas though:D
